Package oracle.kubernetes.operator

Class DomainWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.kubernetes.operator.DomainWatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class DomainWatcher
extends Object
implements Runnable
    This class handles Domain watching. It receives domain events and sends them into the operator for processing.
